title: Number of conference championship game appearances of NFL teams 2020
summary: This bar chart has 16 columns on the x axis representing American Football Teams, and Number of appearances in each American Football Teams on the y axis.
American Football Teams Pittsburgh Steelers has the highest Number of appearances and New York Giants has the lowest Number of appearances.
There is a difference of 11.0 between the maximum American Football Teams Pittsburgh Steelers and minimum American Football Teams New York Giants.
